Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 79th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2004...
Injured on 7/9/2009 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 3 days...
Traded from New York (N) to Montreal on 2/25/2010 (Going to MON: SS T. Zucker. Going to NYM: 2B E. Encarnacion)...
Injured on 4/12/2010 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2011, off Brian Brinkerhoff (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/2011, off Clayton Kershaw (PHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Arizona on 9/10/2012...
Traded from Montreal to San Diego on 4/1/2014 (Going to SDN: 1B J. Upton, SS T. Zucker, P S. Brunell. Going to MON: RF Y. Cespedes)...
Injured on 8/12/2016 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 8/28/2016 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/28/2017 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1995...
